00009 ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter::ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter(string treeName) :
00010 ORVTreeWriter(new ORL2551ScalersDecoder, treeName)
00011 {
00012   fScalersDecoder = dynamic_cast<ORL2551ScalersDecoder*>(fDataDecoder);
00013   fCrate = 0;
00014   fCard = 0;
00015   fChannel = 0;
00016   fScaler = 0;
00017   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();
00018 }

00020 ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter::~ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter()

00022   delete fScalersDecoder;
00023 }

00025 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00026 {
00027   fTree->Branch("crate", &fCrate, "crate/I");
00028   fTree->Branch("card", &fCard, "card/I");
00029   fTree->Branch("channel", &fChannel, "channel/I");
00030   fTree->Branch("scaler", &fScaler, "scaler/I");
00031   return kSuccess;
00032 }
00033 
00034 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORL2551ScalersTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00035 {
00036   // check severity to improve speed
00037   if (ORLogger::GetSeverity() >= ORLogger::kDebug) { 
00038     ORLog(kDebug) << "ProcessMyDataRecord(): got one: "
00039                   << "crate-card-nscalers = " 
00040                   << fScalersDecoder->CrateOf(record) << "-"
00041                   << fScalersDecoder->CardOf(record) << "-" 
00042                   << fScalersDecoder->NScalersOf(record) << endl;
00043   }
00044 
00045   fCrate = fScalersDecoder->CrateOf(record);
00046   fCard = fScalersDecoder->CardOf(record);
00047   for(size_t i=0; i<fScalersDecoder->NScalersOf(record); i++) {
00048     fChannel = fScalersDecoder->IthChannelOf(record, i);
00049     fScaler = fScalersDecoder->IthScalerOf(record, i);
00050     fTree->Fill();
00051   }
00052 
00053   return kSuccess;
00054 }
